title: Reflection on the use of GenAI
text: I used ChatGPT to help me polish writing, fix formatting in Quarto, and troubleshoot GitHub Pages deployment.

title: Reflection on the use of GenAI
text: I used ChatGPT to help me polish writing, fix formatting in Quarto, and troubleshoot GitHub Pages deployment.

title: Reflection on the use of GenAI
text:
How it helped (with examples)

Turning my existing notes into a clean web page structure (headings, lists, links)
Fixing YAML indentation issues and navbar setup

title: Reflection on the use of GenAI
text:
What’s beneficial

Faster drafting and reformatting
Helpful for debugging
Gives examples that I can adapt

title: Reflection on the use of GenAI
text:
What’s challenging

Sometimes I still need to verify steps in my own setup (RStudio/Git settings differ)
I still need to decide what is truthful and relevant

title: Reflection on the use of GenAI
section: How I might use GenAI in future
text:
How I might use GenAI in future
For writing first drafts, cleaning documentation, brainstorming, and debugging. I believe GenAI will be useful in both my studies and future work, especially in areas such as documentation, data analysis explanations, and technical problem solving.

title: Internship Project
text:
During my internship at Singapore Post, I worked on automation and data dashboard projects to support operations and improve efficiency.


The main goal of my project was to help track operational performance and reduce manual reporting work through dashboards and automation.




Built dashboards to visualize locker and kiosk performance
Automated reporting workflows using Power Automate and Excel
Cleaned and organized operational data for analysis
Worked with team members to understand real business requirements





Excel and Power BI for data visualization

Power Automate for workflow automation

Data cleaning and basic analysis

Communication with stakeholders

title: Data Visualization
text: Data visualization allows complex numerical data to be presented in a clear and meaningful way. Through charts and graphs, patterns and trends become easier to understand compared to raw tables of numbers.

title: Data Visualization
text: Data visualization allows complex numerical data to be presented in a clear and meaningful way. Through charts and graphs, patterns and trends become easier to understand compared to raw tables of numbers.

title: Data Visualization
text:
Short Video on Data Visualization

This video explains how data visualization helps in decision-making and communication. It shows how visuals can turn data into useful insights.

title: Data Visualization
text:
About Singapore Institute of Technology



The Singapore Institute of Technology (SIT) focuses on applied learning and industry collaboration. Students are exposed to real-world projects and practical skills that prepare them for professional careers. This learning approach helps students bridge academic knowledge with workplace applications.

title: Home
text:
I’m a FinTech undergraduate at SIT. I like working with data, building dashboards, and exploring how technology affects people and work.



Data analytics & visualization
Automation and process improvement
FinTech systems and product thinking


“I enjoy learning from mistakes, trying again, and slowly getting better at what I do.”

title: Reflection on the use of GenAI
text:
How it helped

Helping me mostly in organising and improving my content into a clean web page structure (headings, lists, links)
Fixing YAML indentation issues and navbar setup
Assisting me when my images were not showing properly

title: Reflection on the use of GenAI
text:
Final thoughts
Overall, GenAI supported my learning process instead of replacing it. It helped me work more efficiently, understand technical concepts better, and reflect more deeply on my own work.
